DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether tropicamide + phenylephrine cyclopentolate + apply wait 30 minute retinoscopy ( new scheme ) inferior apply cyclopentolate alone wait 45 minute retinoscopy ( traditional scheme )
DOC.brief_title: A New More Efficient Cycloplegia Scheme
DOC.criteria: Children 1 10 year Strabismus Ocular surgery Another ocular disease ametropia ( i.e uveitis , cataract ) Cardiovascular neurologic disease . Allergy drug use study
